name: Kulu Manali
description: A beautiful hill station known for its snow-covered mountains, adventure sports, and scenic landscapes.
Enter: Chennai to Bhuntar Airport (nearest airport), then a drive to Manali
Places: Solang Valley, Rohtang Pass, Hidimba Temple, Manu Temple, Mall Road

name: Singapore
description: A vibrant city-state offering a mix of modern attractions, cultural heritage, and entertainment
Enter: Chennai → Singapore Changi Airport (4 hr 30 min)
Hotels: 1.Marina Bay Sands (5-star),2.Raffles Hotel Singapore (5-star),3.Hotel Jen Orchardgateway (4-star)
Places: Gardens by the Bay, Universal Studios Singapore, Sentosa Island, Merlion Park, Chinatown

name: Goa
description: A tropical paradise famous for its beaches, nightlife, water sports, and Portuguese heritage.
Hotels: 1.Taj Exotica Resort & Spa (5-star)),2.The Leela Goa (5-star),3.Holiday Inn Resort Goa (4-star)
Places: Baga Beach, Fort Aguada, Dudhsagar Waterfalls, Calangute Beach, Spice Plantations

name: Rajasthan
description: The land of kings, known for its grand forts, palaces, deserts, and rich cultural heritage.
Enter: Chennai -> Jaipur International Airport (3 hr 15 min)
Hotels: Rambagh Palace (Jaipur, 5-star),2.The Oberoi Udaivilas (Udaipur, 5-star),3.Umaid Bhawan Palace (Jodhpur, 5-star)
Places: Amer Fort, City Palace, Lake Pichola, Mehrangarh Fort, Jantar Mantar

name: Kerala
description: A lush green state with beautiful backwaters, hill stations, and traditional Ayurvedic treatments.
Enter: Chennai → Cochin International Airport (1 hr 20 min)
Hotels: 1.The Leela Kovalam Beach (5-star),2.Spice Village Thekkady (4-star),3.The Tall Trees Munnar (4-star)
Places: Backwaters of Alleppey, Munnar Tea Gardens, Thekkady Wildlife Sanctuary, Fort Kochi

name: Andaman and Nicobar Islands
description: A tropical getaway with crystal-clear waters, pristine beaches, and rich marine life.
Enter: Chennai → Veer Savarkar International Airport (Port Blair) (2 hr 10 min)
Hotels: 1.Taj Exotica Resort & Spa (5-star),2.Seashell Havelock (4-star),3.Silver Sand Beach Resort (3-star)
Places: Radhanagar Beach, Cellular Jail, Snorkeling at Havelock, Ross Island

name: Leh Ladakh, Jammu & Kashmir
description: A dream destination for adventure lovers, offering breathtaking landscapes and monasteries.
Enter: Chennai → Delhi (2 hr 50 min),Delhi → Leh Airport (1 hr 30 min)
Places: Pangong Lake, Nubra Valley, Thiksey Monastery, Khardung La Pass

name: Shimla, Himachal Pradesh
description: A charming hill station known for its colonial architecture, scenic views, and pleasant weather.
Enter: Chennai → Delhi (2 hr 50 min),Delhi → Chandigarh (1 hr 10 min) (Nearest airport to Shimla)
Places: Mall Road, Kufri, Christ Church, Jakhoo Temple, Shimla Ridge

name: Rishikesh, Utterkhand
description: The yoga capital of the world, famous for its spiritual vibes, river rafting, and scenic beauty.
Enter: Chennai → Delhi (2 hr 50 min),Delhi -> Dehradun (1 hr 10 min) (Nearest airport to Rishikesh)
Hotels: Aloha on the Ganges (4-star),2.Lemon Tree Premier, Rishikesh (4-star),3.The Glasshouse on the Ganges (4-star)
Places: River rafting, Lakshman Jhula, Ganga Aarti at Triveni Ghat, Beatles Ashram, Neer Garh Waterfall

name: Ooty, Tamil Nadu
description: A picturesque hill station known for its tea gardens, botanical gardens, and toy train rides.
Enter: Chennai → Coimbatore International Airport (1 hr 10 min)
Places: Solang Valley, Rohtang Pass, Hidimba Temple, Manu Temple, Mall Road

name: Mysore, karnataka
description: A city of palaces and rich heritage, famous for its royal history, vibrant Dasara festival, and beautiful gardens.
Enter: Chennai → Bangalore Kempegowda International Airport (1 hr 5 min),Bangalore → Mysore (by road, 3 hr)
Hotels: 1.The Lalitha Mahal Palace Hotel (5-star),2.Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel Mysore (4-star),3.Silent Shores Resort & Spa (4-star)
Places: Mysore Palace, Chamundeshwari Temple, Brindavan Gardens, St. Philomena's Church

name: Darjeeling, West Bengal
description: A charming hill station known for its tea plantations, toy train, and stunning views of the Kanchenjunga mountains.
Enter: Chennai → Bagdogra Airport (3 hr 20 min) (Nearest airport to Darjeeling)
Hotels: 1.Glenburn Tea Estate (5-star),2.The Windamere Hotel (4-star),3.Summit Grace Hotel & Spa (3-star)
Places: Tiger Hill, Batasia Loop, Himalayan Mountaineering Institute, Peace Pagoda
